description: Example L4 Self-Evaluation Kernel (SEK) report demonstrating structural coherence, rhythmic stability, and phase alignment metrics.
suggestions: Monitor rhythmic patterns for potential instability
Consider geometry re-alignment for improved phase matching

interpretation.C_s_meaning: Structural coherence is strong. Concept mapping is consistent and narrative aligns well with causal chain.
interpretation.R_s_meaning: Rhythmic stability is good. Entropy trend is positive with moderate omega stability.
interpretation.Psi_s_meaning: Phase alignment is acceptable but has room for improvement. Geometry alignment is slightly lagging.
interpretation.status_meaning: System is stable but not yet in 'improving' state (requires all metrics > 0.75)
